bibl.title: Artificial Scripts and Magical Papyri.
bibl.note: 1. Magical scroll. P. Yale Inv. 1802. Ca x cent. A.D. - 2. Magical charms. P. Yale Inv. 1797 and 1798. Ca. vii cent. A.D. [D'après John Shelton, ZPE 25 (1977) p. 159, il s'agirait de faux. Cf. aussi Revel A. Coles and Claudio Gallazzi, Papyri and Ostraka: Alterations and Counterfeits, Scritti Orsolina Montevecchi (Bologna, 1981) pp. 99-105, 8 figg. sur 2 pll.]
bibl.seg: Parássoglou George M., Artificial Scripts and Magical Papyri.

1. Magical scroll. P. Yale Inv. 1802. Ca x cent. A.D. - 2. Magical charms. P. Yale Inv. 1797 and 1798. Ca. vii cent. A.D. [D'après John Shelton, ZPE 25 (1977) p. 159, il s'agirait de faux. Cf. aussi Revel A. Coles and Claudio Gallazzi, Papyri and Ostraka: Alterations and Counterfeits, Scritti Orsolina Montevecchi (Bologna, 1981) pp. 99-105, 8 figg. sur 2 pll.]
